subject: Basketball
Frauds and Swindling
lead_paragraph: Former N.B.A. player Rumeal Robinson, who led the Wolverines to the N.C.A.A. men’s basketball championship in 1989, was convicted of borrowing more than $700,000 for a sham business deal.
snippet: Former N.B.A. player Rumeal Robinson, who led the Wolverines to the N.C.A.A. men’s basketball championship in 1989, was convicted of borrowing more than $700,000 for a sham business deal.
